text:
I don't believe there is actually a separate executable any more, especially if
you do a clean install. You just get a executable with some functions license
locked. They want to be able to be in your face with the non-free stuff so
you'll buy the whole package. -- There are 10 kinds of people in the world...
 those who understand binary and those who don't. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

metadata.topic: Re: Detecting whether PC has Acrobat or Reader
